cpa.games.board.oxo
Class OXOBoard

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--cpa.games.board.oxo.OXOBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Board, java.lang.Cloneable
public class OXOBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements Board

This class is the game engine for the OXO game.

Website

http://www.schilduil.be/javadoc/cpa/games/board/oxo/OXOBoard.html

Constructor Detail

OXOBoard

public OXOBoard()
Default constructor for OXOBoard

OXOBoard

public OXOBoard(int dimension)
Constructor for OXOBoard where you can set the dimension of the board.

Parameters:
dimension - By default the dimension is 2 (2D playing field).

OXOBoard

public OXOBoard(int dimension,
                int size)
Constructor for OXOBoard where you can set the dimension and size of the board.

Parameters:
dimension - By default the dimension is 2 (2D playing field)
size - By default the size is 3 (each dimension is 3 boxes wide).
